content: What open source questionnaire libraries are available for native apps written on iOS and Android? I'm asking on behalf of the coepi project term (https://www.coepi.org/)
https://github.com/smartmarkers from @Raheel Sayeed on iOS
there's also https://github.com/C3-PRO/c3-pro-ios-framework, though it needs a volunteer to keep it up to date
Yeah -- these are both Boston Children's Hospital efforts, FWIW.
